title: Turning Intellect into Impact: Ambani's Vision for an Empathetic Tech Future
description: Mukesh Ambani advocates for India's leadership in artificial intelligence, emphasizing empathy in tech adoption. title: Corruption Conference in Doha concludes with call to maximise potential of AI systems to address corruption, economic crime
description: The world's largest anti-corruption gathering concluded in Doha today with the adoption of the 'Doha Declaration 2025: strengthening international cooperation and technical assistance and seizing the opportunities provided by artificial intelligence systems in preventing and combating corruption'.

title: Last-mile delivery becomes urban pressure point: Can integrated smart logistics fix it?
description: The review finds that technological innovation has rapidly transformed last-mile delivery research and practice over the past decade. Artificial intelligence, machine learning, Internet of Things sensors, autonomous vehicles, and digital simulation tools now dominate the field. These technologies are widely used to optimize routes, predict demand, reduce fuel consumption, and improve real-time visibility across delivery networks.
content: Urban delivery systems are reaching a breaking point as e-commerce growth, traffic congestion, and climate targets collide in cities worldwide. The final leg of delivery, known as the last mile, has become the most expensive, most polluting, and most... [7218 chars]

title: IPS Academy Opens IKS Cell; Seminar Highlights AI's Role in Mathematical Cosmology
description: Indore (Madhya Pradesh) [India], December 20: The Department of Mathematics at IPS Academy, Institute of Science and Research, organised the inauguration of the Indian Knowledge System (IKS) Cell along with a seminar on the topic 'The Role of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in the Current Developments of Mathematical Cosmology - A Future Perspective.'
